thread.title: Oh nothing, just a giant bear out for a stroll through the neighbourhood
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Oh nothing, just a giant bear out for a stroll through the neighbourhood - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Oh nothing, just a giant bear out for a stroll through the neighbourhood
text:
There's nothing like a breath of fresh air and a nice stroll, is there?
You take in some of nature, clear your head, get to roam your own neighbourhood and just get to be out and about. Even if you're a giant bear that could maul you in pieces, it's still good to take in a stroll every now and then.
And that's exactly what's going on here. This bear was sighted strolling through Oak Ridge, New Jersey during the middle of the day, taking in the sights and sounds of the neighbourhood.
It's actually quite terrifying how human they look when they walk on their hind legs.
"How's it going, Bob? Not bad, just out for a stroll. You got any food in this bin? No problem, Bob. You take care."
And then he just saunters off.
Via YouTube
